workflows.description: Fetch invoice data from the API and store it in the invoices variable. This script will run when the page loads and populate the table with invoice data from get_invoices.data, specifically extracting the personName and totalAmount fields.

workflows.name: Fetch Invoices
workflows.description: Fetch invoice data from the API and store it in the invoices variable. This script will run when the page loads and populate the table with invoice data from get_invoices.data, specifically extracting the personName and totalAmount fields.

children.code:
const data =
  collections['52f6abbd-1cde-4e7b-97d1-4fc1ba2e2567']
    ?.data
    ?.data || []

const orderedByCalientes = [...data]
  .map(item => ({
    ...item,
    PorcentajeCalientes: Number(item.PorcentajeCalientes)
  }))
  .sort((a, b) => b.PorcentajeCalientes - a.PorcentajeCalientes)

return orderedByCalientes

display.code:
const roll_id = "rol_3vXHI50DTQuwJey0"

const find_data = collections['156db10f-63e1-439a-9d41-853177cf90b0']
    ?.['data']
    ?.['data']
    ?.some(item => item.id === roll_id)
return find_data ? "Flex" : "None"
//return find_data ? "None" : "Flex"

const find_data = collections['156db10f-63e1-439a-9d41-853177cf90b0']
    ?.['data']
    ?.['data']
    ?.some(item => item.id === roll_id)
return find_data ? "Flex" : "None"

display.code:
const roll_id = "rol_hCaaPHvZN2wkVclC"

const find_data = collections['156db10f-63e1-439a-9d41-853177cf90b0']
    ?.['data']
    ?.['data']
    ?.some(item => item.id === roll_id)

return find_data ? "None" : "Flex"

en.code:
const calientes = collections['2256fcda-0015-4af9-abc2-0186c921d1b8']?.['data']?.['pagination']?.['totals']?.['totalTibios']
const total = collections['2256fcda-0015-4af9-abc2-0186c921d1b8']?.['data']?.['pagination']?.['total']

// Calculate percentage and format with 1 decimal place
const percentage = (calientes * 100) / total
return percentage.toFixed(1) + '%'

const calientes = collections['2256fcda-0015-4af9-abc2-0186c921d1b8']?.['data']?.['pagination']?.['totals']?.['totalFrios']

const total = collections['2256fcda-0015-4af9-abc2-0186c921d1b8']?.['data']?.['pagination']?.['total']

// Calculate percentage and format with 1 decimal place

return percentage.toFixed(1) + '%'

const TAG_LABELS = {
  // üìû Canales de contacto
  "contactado-llamada": "üìû Contactado ‚Äì Llamada",
  "contactado-whatsapp": "üí¨ Contactado ‚Äì WhatsApp",
  "contactado-email": "üìß Contactado ‚Äì Email",
  "contactado-visita": "üè† Contactado ‚Äì Visita",

  // ‚ùå Problemas de contacto
  "no-contesto": "‚ùå No contest√≥",
  "numero-incorrecto": "üìµ N√∫mero incorrecto",

  // ‚è±Ô∏è Estado de la gesti√≥n
  "pendiente-respuesta": "üü° Pendiente de respuesta",
  "reagendar-contacto": "üîÅ Reagendar contacto",
  "seguimiento-3-dias": "‚è≥ Seguimiento en 3 d√≠as",
  "cliente-inactivo": "üí§ Cliente inactivo",

  // üî• Intenci√≥n del cliente
  "interesado": "üî• Interesado",
  "interes-medio": "ü§î Inter√©s medio",
  "sin-interes": "‚ùÑÔ∏è Sin inter√©s",
  "solicita-cotizacion": "üí∞ Solicita cotizaci√≥n",
  "listo-comprar": "üõí Listo para comprar",

  // üìä Resultado
  "cliente-recuperado": "‚úÖ Cliente recuperado",
  "venta-cerrada": "üí∏ Venta cerrada",
  "gestion-fallida": "‚ùå Gesti√≥n fallida",
  "cita-agendada": "üìÖ Cita agendada",

  // üß≠ Motivos de p√©rdida
  "precio": "üí≤ Precio",
  "competencia": "üÜö Se fue con la competencia",
  "falta-stock": "üì¶ Falta de stock",
  "mal-servicio": "ü§ù Mala experiencia previa",
  "cambio-razon-social": "üè¢ Cambi√≥ de raz√≥n social"
}


return wwFormulas.ifEmpty(TAG_LABELS[context.item.data.tag], "")
